name: purewoP
description:
What is a woP? Basically it is good old tron, but made out of 100% pure woP

Featuring:

  • Local Multiplayer: Make your friends rage as they race into your walls
  • Powerups: Pull dazzling moves using the power of pure woP

This game is still in very early development, so there is a lot of polish missing. I also plan on a leveleditor and scrolling levels so that one can play this as a high speed puzzler.
